features: AdvancedSkin Dry 10K/10K: AdvancedSkin Dry 10K/10K protects you against rain, snow and wind, but allows moisture vapor to escape and keep you comfortable. AdvancedSkin Dry 10K/10K provide 10,000mm waterproofness and breathability of 10,000g/m²/24h

Synthetic insulation 100g/m²: Regulates your Body climate to keep you comfortable and warm. Fiberfill fibers reflect the warmth of your body and help it retain heat so you feel comfortable and warm, even when the garment is wet

Stormloft: Stormloft insulation technology mimics the structure, loft and warmth of down, with the fast drying, allergy free performance of synthetic. Light weight but exceptionally warm. Stormloft packs small and feels cozy in any weather
